meanings.definition: The act or practice of playing games.
meanings.sent1: Family gatherings often involve fun gamings.
meanings.sent2: I enjoy gamings with my friends on weekends.
meanings.sent3: The cat's playful gamings with a ball of yarn always make us smile.

meanings.sent5: The children's loud laughter filled the room during their energetic gamings.

meanings.definition: The playing of games, especially video games.
meanings.sent1: Online gamings have become very popular among young people.
meanings.sent2: He spends hours on end immersed in virtual gamings.
meanings.sent3: The intense gamings session kept him up all night.

meanings.definition: The business or industry of producing and selling games.
meanings.sent1: Many people work in the gamings industry to create new entertainment.
meanings.sent2: The gamings market is constantly evolving with new technologies.
